post:
We are the humans over @ DialANetwork. We love to spread passion into our
services. Our main aim is quality at affordable prices, for everyone!

We have been providing a range of hosting services for over 25 months now, with 8
different companies worldwide!
We provide something different, a decent service, something we are known for, our support is one of the
fastest around, with ticket replies almost instant through out the day and night!
Not only that, we offer multiple location choice.
Our main aim is uptime + fast support, which is now rare in the industry, very. But we mastered it!

Our uptime has been great since we started providing virtual private servers, with one-three
outage in the space of a year lasting less than one hour.

Apply the promotion code FRENCHVPS25 to grab 25%
recurring discount on any of our French packages below!

Questions?

How long have you been operating?
We have been around for just about 2 years now and have proven to be a success on the web, not only that, we
now operate over 8 companies!

Uptime?
Our servers have great uptime, we groom our network providers with a blunt attitude to downtime, you don't
want it, we don't, uptime is key! That is why we rarely have any outages!

Great but... Are they oversold?
No, simple. Our prices are at a rate calculated to not oversell and always leave room to grow, most of our
users can verify this, we keep Nodes fast, it is our aim!

So how many locations do you have?
For our VPS services, we offer 3 locations currently, USA, France & Germany.

Support?
We offer 24/7 support, with some of the fastest replies in the industry!

Custom plan?
Just drop us an email! sales@dialahost.co.uk

We look forward to working with you!

Homepage: http://www.dialahost.co.uk/
Packages: http://www.dialahost.co.uk/vpsfrance.php
Terms: http://www.dialahost.co.uk/legal.php
